verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> about after<WH310> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> that Naboth<WH5022> the Jezreelite<WH3158> had<WH1961> a vineyard<WH3754> which<WH834> [was] in Jezreel<WH3157> beside<WH681> the palace<WH1964> of Ahab<WH256> king<WH4428> of Samaria.<WH8111>

"And of Jezebel<WH348> also<WH1571> has the Lord<WH3068> spoken,<WH1696> saying,<WH559> 'The dogs<WH3611> shall eat<WH398> Jezebel<WH348> in the district<WH2426> of Jezreel.<WH3157>'
